The Knights Templar is a powerful Religious Combat Unit. It can earn a mixture of faith and gold whenever it defeats an enemy, equal to 100% of their strength.
Earns [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold from kills. Only after adopting the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Holy Warrior[ENDCOLOR] Belief can you purchase it.

The Poor Fellow-Soldiers of Christ and of the Temple of Solomon (Latin: Pauperes commilitones Christi Templique Salomonici), commonly known as the Knights Templar, the Order of the Temple (French: Ordre du Temple or Templiers) or simply as Templars, were among the most wealthy and powerful of the Western Christian military orders and were among the most prominent actors of the Christian finance.

The Church Artist is a religious unit. it can start a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age like the Great Artist. As a result, you can reserve your artists to create great works.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](It has Combat Strength because if not so, everybody can buy it - the game treats it as standard religious unit)
